item.title: Calendar and Readings
item.description: Textbook [Barro] = Barro, Robert. Intermediate Macroeconomics. 1st ed. Cengage Learning, 2010. ISBN: 9781111486587. [Preview with Google Books] SES # TOPICS READINGS 1 Introduction [Barro] Chapters 1, and 2. 2 The Solow Model: An Introduction to Macroeconomic Modeling and Economic Growth [Barro] Chapters 3, 4, and 5. Solow, Robert M. “A Contribution to the Theory of Economic Growth.” The Quarterly Journal of Economics 70, no. 1 (1956): 65–94. Mankiw, N.
